Miyu:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Miyu:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Miyu:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Miyu:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Miyu:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Miyu:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Miyu:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Miyu:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Miyu:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Miyu:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Miyu:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Miyu:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !Miyu:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
